gold.user: User requests to retrieve all field configurations to understand the current setup of fields in the Jira instance.
gold.ideal: A list of all field configurations with their respective IDs and names.

gold.user: User wants to create a new field configuration for a specific project to manage fields effectively.
gold.ideal: A confirmation of the new field configuration creation along with its ID and details.

gold.user: User intends to delete an obsolete field configuration that is no longer in use.
gold.ideal: A success message confirming the deletion of the specified field configuration.

gold.user: User needs to update the name of an existing field configuration to reflect recent changes in the project.
gold.ideal: A confirmation of the updated field configuration with the new details.

gold.user: User is looking to retrieve all fields associated with a specific field configuration for review.
gold.ideal: A list of fields linked to the specified field configuration, including their IDs and names.

gold.user: User wants to update the fields in a specific field configuration to add or remove fields as necessary.
gold.ideal: A confirmation of the updated field configuration items with the new list of fields.

gold.user: User requests to see all field configuration schemes to manage how fields are displayed across projects.
gold.ideal: A list of all field configuration schemes with their IDs and names.

gold.user: User wants to create a new field configuration scheme to apply specific field configurations to multiple projects.
gold.ideal: A confirmation of the new field configuration scheme creation along with its ID and details.

gold.user: User is looking to retrieve the mappings of field configuration schemes to understand their application.
gold.ideal: A list of mappings between field configuration schemes and their respective projects.

gold.user: User wants to see which field configuration scheme is assigned to a specific project.
gold.ideal: Details of the field configuration scheme currently assigned to the specified project.

gold.user: User intends to assign a specific field configuration scheme to a project to ensure proper field management.
gold.ideal: A confirmation that the field configuration scheme has been successfully assigned to the project.

gold.user: User wants to delete a field configuration scheme that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: A success message confirming the deletion of the specified field configuration scheme.

gold.user: User needs to update the details of a field configuration scheme to reflect recent changes.
gold.ideal: A confirmation of the updated field configuration scheme with the new details.

gold.user: User wants to set or update the mapping of issue types to a field configuration scheme.
gold.ideal: A confirmation that the mapping has been successfully updated.

gold.user: User intends to remove specific issue types from a global field configuration scheme.
gold.ideal: A confirmation that the specified issue types have been successfully removed from the scheme.
